channel.title: Autocast ancients with ancient staff. Rep+
channel.description:
Hey guys, im using black-pearl source and im trying to add autocasting of ancient spells. At the moment when i use ancient staff, then click ice barrage and attack with spell.. It doesnt attack. I was wondering if you guys knew of a tutorial, or could write me one on autocasting.
If you need more details just say so.
Btw im not too sure on how to declare stuff so if you could be specific on that, it would be appreciated. First person to fix gets rep :)

item.title: Autocast ancients with ancient staff. Rep+
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Don’t say you will rep when you can’t

Read full topic
item.source: Autocast ancients with ancient staff. Rep+

item.title: Autocast ancients with ancient staff. Rep+
item.dc:creator: @corruptionpk317 corruptionpk317
item.description:
@corruptionpk317 wrote:

i’ve played about on black-pearl and it already has auto-cast im sure =o.

firsly click the magre book, then barrage then… click the little box with a “magic protection” image insdie it and that should make it highlight red; then all you gotta do is attack and it should auto-cast.

if this doesnt work then sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Autocast ancients with ancient staff. Rep+
